input:
On the table, you see a set of items arranged in a row: a red crayon, a yellow paperclip, a magenta necklace, a grey textbook, and a silver cat toy. What is the color of the left-most item?
Options:
(A) red
(B) orange
(C) yellow
(D) green
(E) blue
(F) brown
(G) magenta
(H) fuchsia
(I) mauve
(J) teal
(K) turquoise
(L) burgundy
(M) silver
(N) gold
(O) black
(P) grey
(Q) purple
(R) pink

On the table, you see several items arranged in a row: a purple dog leash, a magenta cat toy, and a turquoise pair of sunglasses. What is the color of the item furthest from the dog leash?
Options:
(A) red
(B) orange
(C) yellow
(D) green
(E) blue
(F) brown
(G) magenta
(H) fuchsia

(J) teal
(K) turquoise
(L) burgundy
(M) silver
(N) gold
(O) black
(P) grey
(Q) purple
(R) pink

On the table, you see the following things arranged in a row: a silver paperclip, an orange keychain, a magenta envelope, a fuchsia stress ball, and a grey pen. How many non-orange things do you see to the left of the grey thing?
Options:
(A) zero
(B) one
(C) two
(D) three
(E) four
(F) five
(G) six

On the table, you see a bunch of items arranged in a row: a green cat toy, an orange bracelet, a mauve necklace, a pink textbook, a silver sheet of paper, and a gold notebook. How many non-burgundy items do you see to the right of the gold item?
Options:
(A) zero
(B) one
(C) two
(D) three
(E) four
(F) five
(G) six

Options:
